products.title: Vesper Snow Roller Blind
products.description: A sheer fabric with a vertical stripe design which provides privacy during the day whilst still allowing natural light through. Their vesper snow roller blind is a patterned white blind. Free delivery across all orders over 145. Nationwide coverage. Free samples.

products.title: Vesper Lunar Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their semi-translucent vesper range, meshes stylish striped opaque and see-though stripes, with colour favourites to create a truly stunning finish. Vesper vesper grey roller blinds are modern and stylish, and the light streaming through the voile stripes makes for a beautiful effect. Coming with clean white compontents and quality checked before leaving their warehouse, their roller blinds are a family favourite for their durability, value for money and clean finishes.
